GEOGRAPHY
HIGHER LEVEL AND STANDARD LEVEL
PAPER 2 – RESOURCES BOOKLET

Wednesday 17 November 2010 (morning)




INSTRUCTIONS TO CANDIDATES

y Do not open this resources booklet until instructed to do so.
y Use the resources as appropriate to the questions in paper 2.

            C11. Topographic mapping                                                                                                     Key/Legend for map:




8810-5204
                   The map shows the area around Zeebrugge; a commercial port in Belgium.                                                             Motorway                                    Parking place : with/without filling station


                   The scale of the map is 1:50 000 and the contour interval is 2.5 metres. The map is dated 2002                        Main roads         Secondary roads             Linking roads             Other roads
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     Dual carriageways
                   and the satellite photograph is dated 2005.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     Roads with 4 or more lanes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     Roads 7 m wide or more (2 or 3 lanes)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     Roads 3.5 m to 7 m wide

                                                                                                                                                                                                                       a.     Watercourse wider than 50 m
                                                                                                                                                         Road number – Exit
                                                                                                                                                                                                                       b.     Watercourse 25 m to 50 m wide

                                                                                                                                                         Under construction                                            c.     Watercourse 15 m to 25 m wide

                                                                                                                                                                                                                       d.     Watercourse 3 m to 15 m wide
                                                                                                                                                         Road less than 3.5 m wide
                                                                                                                                                                                                                       e.     Brook
                                                                                                                                                         Road with rough surface
                                                                                                                                                                                                                       f.     Intermittent watercourse

                                                                                                                                                         Dirt track – Path                                             g.     Pond

                                                                                                                                                                                                                       h.     Swamp, marsh
                                                                                                                                                         Surfaced path
                                                                                                                                A                                                                                      i.     Spring, fountain, well, reservoir

                                                                                                                                                                                                                       1.     Navigable

                                                                                                                                                         under construction

                                                                                                                                                         Not electrified

                                                                                                                                                         Road narrowing – Tunnel

                                                                                                                                                         Aerial cableway
                                                                                                                                                                                                                       Stone – Kilometre stone

                                                                                                                                                         elevated – ground level

                                                                                                                                                                                                                       Cemetery – Ruin – Greenhouse

                                                                                                                                                                                                                       Contour
                                                                                                                                                                                                                       Auxiliary contour
                                                                                                                                                         Factory, warehouse, shed,                                     Index contour

                                                                                                                                                                                                                       Spot height – Height rounded to the metre
                                                                                                                                                         Church – Chapel or
                                                                                                                                                         shrine – Cross – Castle

                                                                                                                                                                                                  Font.    Fountain

                                                                                                                                                                                                  Ab.      Abbey
                                                                                                                                                         Rock – Spoil heap – Dunes                Alstr.   Landing-stage

                                                                                                                    		                 (b)       Structured question

                                                                                                                                                 The maps show the pattern of wet acid deposition (the higher the value of sulfate units,
                                                           Kilometres                                                                            the more acidic the deposition) for the eastern USA for three different three-year periods.
